title: Convenience Shopping in Free-Sale Component: Convenience shopping in the free-sale component vide DCR 2(IV) 32 shall be permitted along the layout roads
clause_text: Convenience Shopping in Free-Sale Component: Convenience shopping in the free-sale component vide DCR 2(IV) 32 shall be permitted along the layout roads. The CEO, SRA may add to alter or amend the said list for convenience shopping.
section: Commercial / Office / Shop / Economic Activity Free of Cost:
